name: Musical Blind Maze
description:
This game was made in 2016 in Interface class of Universidade Federal de Santa Maria - UFSM.

In this game you are the sound of a heart and your objetive is to go to the music source through the maze. You will hear a click sound everytime you hit a wall.

How to play:

*Headphones are extremely recommended*

Press 'Enter' after the loading to start the game (if the music don't change, click with the mouse in the screen, than press entrer again).

Use the 'arrow keys' to move through the maze.

Press 'Backspace' to restart the level.

Credits:

Engine: Contruct 2

Sounds: freesound.org

Design/Programming: Bruno Gat Car
